name: Blaze and the Monster Machines
overview: AJ is an 8-year-old techie who drives monster-truck Blaze, the top racer in Axle City. The two go on adventures that have them taking on problems involving science and math. Many predicaments they face are caused by Blaze's rival, Crusher, a tractor-trailer that will do anything to beat other vehicles to the finish line. The animated series is billed as the first TV show for preschoolers to comprehensively cover areas of science, technology, engineering and math. Each episode introduces different STEM concepts, including buoyancy and trajectory.

episodes.name: Blaze of Glory
episodes.overview: Blaze steps up when a cheating truck uses dirty tricks to try and win the championship race.

episodes.name: Blaze of Glory - Part 2
episodes.overview: Blaze steps up when a cheating truck uses dirty tricks to try and win the championship race.

episodes.name: The Driving Force
episodes.overview: When Starla loses one of her pistons, Blaze and AJ try to get it back before Crusher can take it.

episodes.name: Tool Duel
episodes.overview: Crusher steals all of Gabby's tools, and Blaze must help her retrieve them so she can repair the Monster Machines.

episodes.name: Bouncy Tires
episodes.overview: Zeg the dinosaur truck accidentally dons a set of super bouncy tires, causing him to bounce out of control.

episodes.name: Stuntmania!
episodes.overview: The Monster Machines are eager to see Darington's stunt track, but Crusher tricks Darington, sending him far away.

episodes.name: Epic Sail
episodes.overview: Crusher and Pickle challenge Blaze and the others to a sailboat race, but Crusher's attempt at cheating shipwrecks both teams.

episodes.name: The Team Truck Challenge
episodes.overview: On the day of the Team Truck Challenge, Crusher chooses someone other than Pickle as his partner, which disappoints Pickle.

episodes.name: The Jungle Horn
episodes.overview: When Crusher steals Stripes' jungle horn, Blaze and Stripes speed after him in a chase to get it back.

episodes.name: Truckball Team-Up
episodes.overview: When Crusher challenges Blaze to a game of truckball, Blaze must scour Axle City to put together a team before the big game.

episodes.name: Cake-tastrophe!
episodes.overview: When Crusher accidentally turns the baker truck's baker bots to messy mode, they sprout wheels and drive away.

episodes.name: The Mystery Bandit
episodes.overview: When a mysterious bandit makes off with Blaze's metallic trophy, he must track down the culprit.

episodes.name: Gasquatch!
episodes.overview: Blaze and AJ discover a mud-loving monster truck in the woods and set out on an adventure to bring their new friend to Mud Fest.

episodes.name: Truck Rangers
episodes.overview: Blaze and his friends join the Truck Rangers, a scouting club where trucks earn badges for their accomplishments.

episodes.name: Trouble at the Truck Wash
episodes.overview: Blaze and AJ must track down the missing pieces of Gabby's Truck Wash and rebuild it so their friends can get clean.

episodes.name: Zeg and the Egg
episodes.overview: Zeg, Blaze and AJ find a tiny dinosaur egg and try to return it to its mother.

episodes.name: Runaway Rocket
episodes.overview: When Crusher tries to cheat at a carnival game, he accidentally strands himself and Pickle on a giant rocket.

episodes.name: Cattle Drive
episodes.overview: When Blaze and Starla encounter a herd of cows wandering in the desert, they embark on a wild west adventure to bring the cows back to Starla's barn.

episodes.name: Dragon Island Duel
episodes.overview: When Crusher cheats during a tropical island race with Blaze, AJ manages to rescue his best friend while overcoming obstacles.

episodes.name: Sneezing Cold
episodes.overview: Blaze's friends each have the sneezles (except for Pickle, Blaze, AJ, and Gabby) , so Gabby, Blaze, and AJ must bring them medicine oil to help them feel better.

episodes.name: Fired Up!
episodes.overview: In the second-season opener, Blaze smells smoke and gets his pals to safety, prompting a fire chief to encourage Blaze to become a firefighter.

episodes.name: Dino Dash
episodes.overview: Zeg lands in a mud pit located far away, so Blaze and AJ try to rescue him by using a new engineering design inspired by their dinosaur-truck pals.

episodes.name: Truck or Treat!
episodes.overview: It's Halloween in Axle City, and Blaze, AJ, and all of their friends are excited to "Truck or Treat." But when Crusher tries to steal all of their candy, his plan goes awry, and he sends their treats far away from Axle City.

episodes.name: Race to the Top of the World, part 1
episodes.overview: Blaze and his friends compete in the most epic race in history. They meet pirates and the Sphinx on a whirlwind world-tour. But when Crusher throws them off course, Blaze and pals must persevere to make it to the finish line.

episodes.name: Race to the Top of the World, part 2
episodes.overview: Blaze and his friends compete in the most epic race in history. They meet pirates and the Sphinx on a whirlwind world-tour. But when Crusher throws them off course, Blaze and pals must persevere to make it to the finish line.

episodes.name: Monster Machine Christmas
episodes.overview: It's Christmas Eve, and Blaze and AJ are helping Santa load his magic bag of presents to deliver all over the world. But Crusher accidently knocks over the bag and sends the presents flying.

episodes.name: Knight Riders
episodes.overview: A light thief is on the loose, leaving all of Axle City in the dark! Gabby outfits Blaze with special lights to help him track down the light thief and restore the missing lights.

episodes.name: Darington to the Moon!
episodes.overview: Today Darington will attempt his biggest stunt yet: rocketing to the moon! But there's just one problem. His battery-powered rocket is out of energy. To get to the moon Blaze must help Darington recharge his battery.

episodes.name: Piggy 500
episodes.overview: It's the day of the Piggy 500, and Starla is teaming up with her prize pig, Zippy, to race. But when her competitor Crusher and his rude pig, Slop, cheat and send Zippy far away, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Starla to find him and get back to the race in time.

episodes.name: Spark Bug
episodes.overview: Blaze, Stripes, and AJ are racing through the jungle when Stripes discovers a lost little fire beetle named Sparky. Blaze and his friends set off across the jungle to help Sparky get back home to the top of a red hot volcano.

episodes.name: Five Alarm Blaze
episodes.overview: There's a fire on the bridge, and it's too much for the Fire Chief and his team to handle. They need Firefighting Blaze to help. With time running out, Blaze hurries across town. But can he get to the bridge in time?

episodes.name: Axle City Grand Prix
episodes.overview: Axle City Grand Prix: Gabby has the perfect tool to get Blaze ready to race: a special remote that can control any machine. But when Crusher takes her remote, he activates machines all over town to slow Blaze down.

episodes.name: Treasure Track
episodes.overview: Blaze, AJ, and Gabby join Pegwheel the Pirate-Truck for an island treasure hunt! Following their treasure map, the friends search jungle beaches and mountains to find where X marks the spot.

episodes.name: Rocket Ski Rescue
episodes.overview: Crusher's Grammy is in town to watch Crusher and Blaze race at the Monster Dome. But when Crusher tries to cheat using rocket skis, his plan backfires, blasting him off the racetrack and across Axle City. Now Blaze must team up with Grammy to rescue Crusher.

episodes.name: Dinosaur Parade
episodes.overview: Blaze, AJ, and lots of spectators have gathered to watch herds of dinosaurs march through Axle City! But when Crusher pushes his way into the parade, he scatters dinos everywhere, and it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Zeg to find and rescue them.

episodes.name: Race Car Superstar
episodes.overview: While visiting another town, a snooty car traps all of the racers, and Blaze must become a racecar to free his new friends.

episodes.name: Race to Eagle Rock
episodes.overview: Blaze brings all of his monster truck pals to VelocityVille for a wild race to the top of Eagle Rock. But Crusher will stop at nothing to beat race car Blaze and friends, setting traps to slow them down.

episodes.name: Sky Track
episodes.overview: Swoops the helicopter loses his rotor, and without it he can't fly! It's time for Blaze and AJ to retrieve the runaway rotor, adventuring up onto The Sky Track, an amazing course that weaves through the clouds.

episodes.name: The Wishing Wheel
episodes.overview: Blaze, AJ, and Stripes are searching for the Wishing Wheel: a magical treasure that will grant a wish for one lucky race car. But with chomping, stomping, and slithering dangers at every turn, can Blaze and his friends stay on track?

episodes.name: Pickle Power
episodes.overview: Crusher builds a super-powered vacuum to clean up his big mess - but the machine goes haywire, sucking up Crusher and everything in its path! Now Pickle must team up with Blaze and AJ to stop the vacuum and save Crusher.

episodes.name: Dinocoaster
episodes.overview: In the third-season opener, Zeg loses a coveted ticket to ride on a new dinosaur roller coaster, so Blaze helps his pal track down the missing ticket.

episodes.name: The Hundred Mile Race
episodes.overview: Blaze visits VelocityVille to compete with his new race car pals in the Hundred Mile Race; Crusher will do anything to win the race.

episodes.name: The Polar Derby
episodes.overview: Blaze and his friends head to VelocityVille and transform into racecars for the Polar Derby, a wintry race through snow! But when racecar crusher knocks them off-course, the pals must keep cool to stay on track.

episodes.name: Light Riders
episodes.overview:
A light thief storms the city and leaves it in the dark, so Blaze tries to remedy the situation by donning special lights to hunt down the criminal.

Song: "Light"

episodes.name: Catch That Cake!
episodes.overview: It's Darington's birthday! Crusher uses a robot plate to try and steal the birthday cake, but his plan goes awry and the cake goes rocketing away. Will Blaze catch the runaway cake before Crusher and save the party?

episodes.name: The Bouncing Bull Racetrack
episodes.overview: Blaze and Starla discover a map that leads to a track of legend  the Bouncing Bull Racetrack!  The friends set out on a Wild West quest to find the track and take the ride of their lives.

episodes.name: Mega Mud Robot
episodes.overview: Gasquatch's coins go missing before he makes a purchase at the toy store, so Blaze tries to help him recover them before the toy store closes.

episodes.name: Knighty Knights
episodes.overview: In the kingdom of knight-trucks, Blaze must recover a stolen charging machine before everyone in the kingdom runs out of energy and falls asleep.

episodes.name: Animal Island
episodes.overview: When Blaze and Stripes sail to Animal Island, an incredible place inhabited my monster truck animals, a greedy lizard puts the entire island in peril.

episodes.name: Toucan Do It!
episodes.overview: Blaze, Starla and Darington want to play jungle ball, but their teammate Tooks the Toucan gets launched from the stadium.

episodes.name: Falcon Quest
episodes.overview: Challenged by a tough-talking falcon, Blaze takes off on a journey to earn his place with the fast fliers in the sky above Animal Island.

episodes.name: The Big Ant-venture
episodes.overview: Blaze and Zeg are on Animal Island when they discover a world of tiny creatures right under their tires called Insect City.

episodes.name: Ready, Set, Roar!
episodes.overview: Blaze and Stripes transform into jungle cats in order to race in the Animal Land Championship, but they must beat a cheating cheetah.

episodes.name: The Great Animal Crown
episodes.overview: When the Great Animal Crown is lost at the bottom of the ocean, Blaze transforms into a shark to retrieve it for his Animal Island friends. But he'll have to swim fast - or Crusher maidiy get to the crown first.

episodes.name: Tow Truck Tough
episodes.overview: Blaze transforms into a tow-truck, and, with the help of AJ and Gabby, sets off on a tow-tally awesome adventure to save Stripes.

episodes.name: Race for the Golden Treasure
episodes.overview: Blaze and Pegwheel the Pirate have teamed up for the ultimate treasure hunt! Together they must find three keys to unlock a special chest. But Crusher's sailing the high seas too, and he'll do anything to get the treasure.

episodes.name: Need for Blazing Speed
episodes.overview: When Crusher tries to get Blazing Speed for himself, he accidentally sends Blaze's engine flying! Now it's Blaze vs. Crusher in a race for Blazing Speed - but without an engine, Blaze must find new ways to propel himself to victory.

episodes.name: Fast Friends
episodes.overview: Blaze, AJ, and Gabby meeta brand new monster machine named Watts - A super fast truck with electric tires! But when one of her special tires goes rolling into the jungle, Blaze, AJ, and Gabby promise to help her get it back.

episodes.name: Raceday Rescue
episodes.overview: It's race day, and Crusher is cheating twice as hard to beat blaze and Watts - sending both drivers far, far away! But Blaze and Watts are determined to save AJ and Gabby and get back to the race in time to win!

episodes.name: Defeat the Cheat
episodes.overview: It's the second ever Team Truck Challenge - a big race that pairs trucks together in racing teams. And this time Blaze's teammate is...Crusher?! Will Crusher be able to resist his cheating ways to win for the very first time?

episodes.name: The Chicken Circus!
episodes.overview: Blaze, AJ, and Darington are in the front row for the amazing Chicken Circus; when Crusher accidentally launches the chickens far, far away, it is up to Blaze and Darington to get their feathered friends back to the big top.

episodes.name: The Pickle Family Campout
episodes.overview: When all the members of Pickle's family get lost in the woods, Pickle teams up with Blaze as a tow truck to save them.

episodes.name: Robot Power
episodes.overview: When Crusher unleashed three of his most destructive robots in Axle City, only Robot Blaze is strong enough to save the day.

episodes.name: Breaking the Ice
episodes.overview: When a little bunny gets trapped on top of a melting glacier, Blaze must put his new robot powers to the test as he races to the rescue.

episodes.name: Robots to the Rescue
episodes.overview: When three big emergencies turn out to be too much for one truck alone, Blaze turns himself and his friends into powerful robots to save Axle City from a runaway train, an overflowing glue factory and an erupting volcano.

episodes.name: The Supersize Prize
episodes.overview: At the Axle City Fair, Blaze and AJ realize they do not have enough coins to use the new Supersize Prize Machine; Blaze earns money by getting three different jobs, transforming into super-cool vehicles to take care of business.

episodes.name: T-Rex Trouble
episodes.overview: In Dinosaur Valley, Blaze and Zeg show off their amazing robot powers to their dinosaur friends; when they discover three lost little tyrannosauruses, they must use their robot powers to get the babies home safely.

episodes.name: Meatball Mayhem
episodes.overview: When Crusher accidentally knocks a bottle of "grow spice" onto a meatball, it grows to an enormous size and rolls away; Blaze and Pickle transform into robots to stop the meatball before it wrecks the entire town.

episodes.name: Robots in Space
episodes.overview: When Space Commander Megan is marooned on Pluto, our robot heroes will race through wormholes, shoot past ice volcanoes, and blast straight through an asteroid field to bring their new friend back home.

episodes.name: Power Tires
episodes.overview: When his tires get popped, Blaze thinks he's out of the race for good. Luckily, Gabby is there with a new set of Power Tires-high tech wheels that can turn into anything Blaze needs to keep on rolling!

episodes.name: Ninja Blaze
episodes.overview: Ninja master Blackbelt is teaching Blaze and AJ how to be powerful ninjas when Crusher and Pickle accidentally launch themselves into an icy mountain.

episodes.name: Snow Day Showdown
episodes.overview: During a snowy day in Axle City, Crusher attempts to take some hot chocolate for himself but sends it launching onto a faraway mountain, and Blaze is in hot pursuit to get it back before Crusher.

episodes.name: Construction Crew to the Rescue
episodes.overview: Blaze, Stripes and Starla become construction vehicles to rescue Crusher and Pickle when they build a tall tower with no way back down.

episodes.name: Officer Blaze
episodes.overview: Blaze and AJ become police officers and help Officer Anna solve three problems around town. Meanwhile, Crusher has problems being a police officer himself when Pickle messes up the siren.

episodes.name: The Flying Lion
episodes.overview: Blaze and AJ discover a magical world where they meet a flying lion named Roarian, but his magical sunstone goes missing when Crusher attempts to take it, and Blaze has to get it back before Crusher does.

episodes.name: Ninja Soup
episodes.overview: Blaze, AJ and Blackbelt work to find ingredients for a special soup for Blackbelt's Grandma Ninja when she gets a cold. Meanwhile, Crusher opens Pickle's pinatas which have rather strange goodies inside.

episodes.name: Royal Rescue
episodes.overview: A visit to the King's castle goes awry when the King accidentally catapults himself far, far away; to bring him home, Blaze, AJ, and the King's adorable pet dragon, Zeek, must transform into knights in shining armor.

episodes.name: The 100 Egg Challenge
episodes.overview: Its time for the 100 Egg Challenge, where the first truck to find 100 eggs gets a chocolate trophy. Blaze and Crusher race each other to see who can find that many eggs first. Elsewhere, Pickle is smelling the flowers and Crusher ends up smelling those that are disgusting.

episodes.name: Blaze and the Magic Genie
episodes.overview: Blaze and AJ meet a genie in the desert who can grant any wish they want, but he loses his three wishing jewels in a sandstorm and they help him retrieve them. Meanwhile, Crusher participates on Pickle's genie-themed game show which gives him strange prizes.

episodes.name: The Midnight Mile
episodes.overview: All the trucks in Axle City stay up late for the ultimate race, the Midnight Mile, with the first truck to cross the finish line winning the Glow-in-the-Dark trophy.

episodes.name: The Island of Lost Treasure
episodes.overview: When Blaze and Darington arrive at the Island of Lost Treasure and find a map to a treasure chest, they have to dodge various obstacles if they want to find out what it is. Meanwhile, back in Axle City, Crusher joins Pickle for various hunts which turns out to be not as expected.

episodes.name: AJ to the Rescue
episodes.overview: Blaze gets trapped in super sticky mud after rescuing the little monkey's kite, and AJ must go on a solo adventure to find animal friends who will help free him. Meanwhile, Pickle hosts a comedy improv and Crusher runs into trouble when he tries to tell a joke himself.

episodes.name: The Trophy Chase
episodes.overview: Blaze, Stripes, Starla, and Zeg have to retrieve a trophy for the championship race after Crusher's latest invention the Flying Fetcher steals it before the race begins. During the chase, Pickle shows Crusher the trophies he got for avoiding accidents.

episodes.name: Babysitting Heroes
episodes.overview: Blaze, AJ and Stripes babysit some baby animals, but they fly away on bubbles and they must save them. Meanwhile, Crusher claims he can do the animal talents Pickle tries out with disastrous results.

episodes.name: Abra-Ka-Pickle!
episodes.overview: Pickle is putting on a magic show for all of Axle City, but when Crusher accidentally makes a magical mistake, its up to Blaze and Pickle to fix the magic and save him, Starla, and Darington.

episodes.name: Toy Trouble!
episodes.overview: The Axle City toy store's amazing machine can make any toy one wants, but when Crusher unknowingly uses it to make massive toys that run amok, only Blaze, AJ, Gabby, and Watts can stop the giant toys from making a giant mess. Meanwhile, Pickle shows Crusher his collection of Pickle toys which he doesn't take a liking for that much.

episodes.name: Deep Sea Grand Prix
episodes.overview: For the first time ever, Blaze and AJ race under the ocean; Blaze transforms into a submarine and speeds through sunken ships and coral reefs to reach the giant sand castle at the finish line.

episodes.name: Recycling Power!
episodes.overview: When Axle City is visited by a littering raccoon, it's up to Blaze to save the day as a Super Recycling Truck; he cleans up the town and rescues his friends just in time for a final showdown with the Litter Critter.

episodes.name: The Great Space Race
episodes.overview: Blaze and AJ take off into space for the Great Space Race, and join aliens Zork, Oola and Zuzu to race to the finishing planet against Crusher's rocket. During the race, Crusher encounters Pickle searching for foods in space which he unintentionally finds for him.

episodes.name: Ice Cream Monster Machine
episodes.overview: Gasquatch invites Blaze and AJ to his ice cream party, but forgets the ice cream; Blaze transforms into an ice cream maker and races to reach Gasquatch's house in time. Meanwhile, Crusher gets some ice cream for dessert but ends up with different animals inside each one.

episodes.name: The Mechanic Team!
episodes.overview: Blaze stops into Gabby's garage for a quick repair  just as she gets an alert. Three far-flung trucks need her mechanical know-how. So, Blaze and AJ volunteer to help her take her garage on the go. Meanwhile, Crusher and Pickle look after her garage, but Crusher keeps playing things in there.

episodes.name: Blazing Amazing Stories
episodes.overview: Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle are babysitting for his baby sister Baby Gherkin! When it's time for her nap, they tell her three epic bedtime stories about police, cowboys, and superheroes - all starring Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle!

episodes.name: Big Rig Blaze
episodes.overview: When a windstorm blows away the supplies for Stripes' Animal Party, Blaze transforms into the one Monster Machine strong enough to haul them all back: a Big Rig. But they better hurry before the pirate bighorns steal everything. Meanwhile, Pickle is pretending to be a Big Rig as well and gives Crusher things that turned out to be animals.

episodes.name: The Big Balloon Rescue
episodes.overview: All of Axle City is enjoying the Balloon Fair until Crusher and Pickle get stuck on a runaway hot air balloon; now it's up to Blaze and AJ to rescue their high-flying friends before they crash into the Slime Volcano.

episodes.name: Space Alien Adventure!
episodes.overview: Blaze and AJ make friends with a space alien named Gormy, but when Gormy's jet pack loses power, they set out to help him find three special space batteries so he can fly home to his alien family. Meanwhile, Crusher looks into Pickle's telescope and sees stuff from outer space falling from the sky.

episodes.name: Video Game Heroes
episodes.overview: Blaze and AJ must retrieve three keys that flew out of Blaze's new video game after Crusher dropped it and slipped in a mud puddle, and save the dragon stuck in the tower. Meanwhile, Crusher and Pickle test out the power shapes that came from Blaze's game, but Crusher's results come in strange forms.

episodes.name: The Race Around the Earth
episodes.overview: In their biggest race ever, Blaze and AJ go head-to-head against Crusher to race all the way around the Earth and win the Worlds Biggest Trophy! During the race, Pickle drives every vehicle to go around the world.

episodes.name: The Blaze Family
episodes.overview: Blaze and AJ are spending the day with some very special trucks: Blazes family! His parents and little sister Sparkle join him in a race against Crusher to prove theyre the worlds fastest family! During the race, Pickle tells Crusher knock-knock jokes about Blaze's family.

episodes.name: The Treat Thief
episodes.overview: Officer Blaze just got his biggest case yet, to track down the mischievous Treat Thief, and with help from Officer Anna, Blaze sets out to stop the thief and recover every stolen treat.

episodes.name: Big Rig to the Rescue!
episodes.overview: When three big deliveries are needed all over Axle City, theres only one monster machine with the power to haul it all: Big Rig Blaze! But he even may not be able to make all the deliveries in time. At the same time and everywhere they go, Crusher tries to be stronger than Blaze but Pickle gives him more heavy stuff which leads to disastrous results.

episodes.name: Dino Derby
episodes.overview: Dinosaur Blaze teams up with his prehistoric pal Zeg in order to compete in the Dino Derby, but he wonders if the duo has what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions.

episodes.name: The Amazing Stunt Kitty
episodes.overview: When a big stunt goes awry, Darington is sent flying away on an out-of-control balloon; Blaze, A.J. and Stunt Kitty must save the day.

episodes.name: Sir Blaze and the Unicorn
episodes.overview: Sir Blaze and Sir AJ attempt to free a magical unicorn.

episodes.name: Sparkles Racing Badge
episodes.overview: Its more Blaze family fun in this high octane, action-packed adventure as Blaze and his little sister Sparkle team up to make it back to the Monster Dome in time for a big race against Crusher.

episodes.name: Race to Sky High Mountain
episodes.overview: At the starting line for the race to Sky High Mountain, one of Crusher's cheats threatens to sideline Blaze for good by pouring cement on them; to get back in this race, Blaze will need power tires. Meanwhile, for the second time, Pickle opens a tire store with strange tires.

episodes.name: The Puppy Chase
episodes.overview: When a big bubble floats away with Gabbys new puppy Chassis while trying to take a bath, shell team up with Blaze and AJ to get her back. Meanwhile, Pickle opens up a pet store giving Crusher a pet with strange things.

episodes.name: The Gold Medal Games
episodes.overview: When Crusher sends Team Blaze away from the Gold Medal Games, Blaze and AJ will have to use their sport smarts to get back and win the gold medal. Meanwhile, Crusher tries to be the best at all sports by doing tricks but ends up failing. Also, Pickle is the coach of the all the games and teaches the sports legends how to be at their best.

episodes.name: Firefighters to the Rescue
episodes.overview: When three fire emergencies break out across Axle City, its up to Blaze to put em out  and to do it, hell transform into the most epic fire rescue vehicles weve ever seen! Meanwhile, Crusher and Pickle are playing firefighters. Crusher tries to put out a pretend fire, with the fire hose but strange things come out instead of water.

episodes.name: The Construction Contest
episodes.overview: Blaze and his friends turn into construction vehicles, but Crusher sends them far away.

episodes.name: Starla's Wild West Birthday
episodes.overview: Starla's Wild West birthday party is in trouble when her cake gets carried off by a runaway train.

episodes.name: Race to the Golden Gift
episodes.overview: In order to win the race, Blaze and his friends have to get past Crusher and his batch of cheats.

episodes.name: The Tiger Treasure
episodes.overview: AJ and Stripes test their explorer skills as they follow the trail to the fabled Tiger Treasure.

episodes.name: The Boingies!
episodes.overview: When a bunch of adorable critters get lost in Axle City, it's up to Blaze and AJ to get them home.

episodes.name: The Snow Spectacular
episodes.overview: Blaze and AJ help a truck named Snowbie get home in time for the Great Snowball Fight.

episodes.name: Snow Rescue Blaze
episodes.overview: When a big ski mishap gets Crusher and Pickle stuck super far away, Blaze and AJ perform a daring snow rescue to save the day.

episodes.name: Special Mission Blaze
episodes.overview: When a nefarious villain steals every toothbrush in Axle City, Blaze's only chance at saving the day is to become Special Mission Blaze.

episodes.name: The Fastest of Them All
episodes.overview: When a greedy queen casts a spell to make friends slow down, Blaze and AJ must race her for the magical cure.

episodes.name: Megabot
episodes.overview: Blaze and AJ help their new friend Megabot get to Axle City in time for the big Robot Parade.

episodes.name: The Treasure of the Broken Key: A Musical Adventure
episodes.overview: The Treasure of the Broken Key: A Musical Adventure: In the first-ever Blaze Musical, Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle are on a daring quest to find the pieces of the Broken Key and unlock a secret treasure.

episodes.name: Lifeguard Blaze
episodes.overview: Today, Blaze and AJ are on a mission to become Lifeguards. It'll take four daring rescues to achieve their official Lifeguard badge and only the bravest monster trucks have what it takes. Can Blaze and AJ rescue all the trucks and become real lifeguards?

episodes.name: Campfire Stories!
episodes.overview: It's a campout under the stars! Blaze, AJ, Watts, Gabby, Crusher, and Pickle are gathered around the campfire to tell the most amazing stories they can make up! And the best part? Whoever tells the best story wins the last marshmallow!

episodes.name: Super Wheels
episodes.overview: Blaze and AJ are driving around Axle City when they find a pair of special wheels that transform him into SUPER BLAZE! When the trouble Bots from outer space land in Axle City, Blaze uses his new superpowers to help send them back to their home planet!

episodes.name: Sparkle's Big Rescue
episodes.overview: When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

episodes.name: Mail Truck Blaze
episodes.overview: When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all, Mail Truck Blaze! He and AJ will swim across seas, climb mountains and venture to the Monster Dome, because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver. Meanwhile, Crusher pretends to be a mail carrier to deliver Pickle a letter up high instead of a ladder, but things go wrong.

episodes.name: The Great Pizza Race
episodes.overview: It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter...The Great Pizza Race! Who will deliver all of their pizzas first and win the coveted Great Pizza Trophy?

episodes.name: Monster Machine Halloween
episodes.overview: Its Halloween in Axle City, and Blaze, AJ, Stripes, Starla, and Zeg are racing in The Great Halloween Race! First one across the finish line wins the biggest, tastiest goody bag ever! But if they want this treat, they need to watch out for Crusher's tricks!

episodes.name: Knights in Sparkling Armor
episodes.overview: When Crusher and Pickle are trapped inside a cage over a bubbling slime swamp, its up to Blaze, his little sister Sparkle, and, AJ to become...Knights! Will they be able to rescue Crusher and Pickle from the swamp before its too late?

episodes.name: A Blazing Amazing Christmas
episodes.overview: It's Christmas Eve and Blaze, AJ, Crusher, Pickle, and all their other friends are helping Santa ready his sleigh for delivery. But when Crusher discovers he won't get a present this year, Blaze and AJ offer to help him do enough kind deeds to earn a gift and three stars.

episodes.name: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery
episodes.overview: When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to do the job - Big Rig Blaze! Meanwhile, Pickle is taking pictures, and Crusher wants him to take a picture of his style, but things go wrong when he goes overboard.

episodes.name: The Snowflake Games
episodes.overview: It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Snowflake Games! Who will win the most winter sports and receive the prized Snowflake Medal?

episodes.name: Paramedic Power
episodes.overview: Blaze transforms into an ambulance and begins providing aid to Stripes, Starla, and Darington in need, along with AJ and Gabby's team of paramedics. Meanwhile, Crusher and Pickle are pretending to be paramedics, and Pickle gives Crusher medical tools that happens to be different stuff.

episodes.name: Renewable Energy Racers
episodes.overview: AJ and Gabby give Blaze, Starla, Crusher, and Pickle renewable engines; when a sneaky guzzler truck steals their gas, they will have to use renewable energy to finish the race.

episodes.name: Mission to Mars
episodes.overview: NASA's Commander Megan is back and she's taking Blaze, AJ, Crusher and Pickle to Mars; but when Crusher accidentally detaches the rocket ship's thrusters, it's up to Blaze and AJ to navigate Mars and get those thrusters back.

episodes.name: The Flying Contest
episodes.overview: Blaze and AJ enter a very special competition involving flying machines! When Crusher sends them flying away from Axle City again, they must use their techno smarts to get back in time to build their ultimate flying invention.

episodes.name: The Super Skateboard
episodes.overview: When Crusher's Grandma returns to Axle City for a very special birthday party, Blaze and AJ help Crusher do lots of Pickle's different jobs in order to earn money to purchase her a very special gift: an extremely awesome super skateboard!

episodes.name: The Baby Robot From Outer Space
episodes.overview: When the Baby Robot from Outer Space turns everyone into babies, it's up to Blaze and his new Special Mission Modes to save the day.

episodes.name: The Yucky Ducky
episodes.overview: When the Yucky Ducky covers Axle City in icky, sticky grossigoo, it's up to Special Mission Blaze to stop her machine and save the world from being grossified.

episodes.name: The Pillow Pirate
episodes.overview: When a burgling buccaneer steals every pillow in Axle City, it's up to Special Mission Blaze to save bedtime.

episodes.name: Super Wheels vs. The Bubblemaker
episodes.overview: Blaze and Sparkle have to become superheroes to save Axle City when the Bubblemaker starts trapping everything in his trouble bubbles.

episodes.name: Super Wheels vs. The Green Queen
episodes.overview: The Green Queen is turning everything in Axle City green. Blaze, Watts, and Darington can transform into superheroes luckily. They try to stop The Green Queen before Axle City is one color forever.

episodes.name: Arcade Adventure
episodes.overview: Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle are at the arcade-and Sparkle's got her eye on an amazing glitter rocket! But, when she doesn't have enough tickets for the rocket, the friends must jump inside different video games and win enough tickets to collect the prize!

episodes.name: Pickleworld!
episodes.overview: It's Pickleworld! The coolest, most pickle-riffic theme park in ALL of Axle City. Too bad Pickle's family got lost on the way there! In their briniest adventure yet, it's up to Blaze and Pickle to rescue the family and bring them back to the park.

episodes.name: Super Slide Trophy
episodes.overview: Blaze and Gasquatch compete to win the Super Slide Trophy! But when they run into problems along the way, Gasquatch knows just how to solve them... with mud!

episodes.name: Wild West Heroes
episodes.overview: Heroes[3] Yeehaw! Blaze, AJ, and Starla are on their way to a Wild West Picnic! But when the Lunchbox Bandit steals everyone's lunchboxes, it's up to our Wild West Heroes to get them back!

episodes.name: Flying Robot Rescue
episodes.overview: Crusher's robot sends Crusher and Pickle far away; it's up to Robot Blaze and Robot Sparkle to rescue them using coding.

episodes.name: Magic Spell Mayhem
episodes.overview: A magic potion turns Crusher into a chicken; it's up to Blaze and AJ to collect three potion ingredients and change him back into a Monster Machine.

episodes.name: Valentine's Day Rescue
episodes.overview: Zeg, Darington and Starla get lost on their way to the Valentine's Day party.

episodes.name: Video Game Land: A Monster Machine Super Special
